name: Ygdra
description:
Teleported into a mysterious labyrinth after accidentally stepping on a yellow plate, can you find the purple plate that leads out ?

Also, someone hid chests in the labyrinth, can you find them all ?

====

This game is partly inspired by an entry I made for a previous ProcJam (https://feufochmar.itch.io/yggdrasil-generator). I wondered if I could make into a 3D game.
